creature.name: Creature
creature.effect: Destroy an ally with 0 base point. This character must be played in the same position as the destroyed ally.

trainer.name: Trainer
trainer.effect: When this character gets an alteration, draw a card.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.effect: On this character, the effect of the {{strength}} alteration is doubled.

punisher.name: Punisher
punisher.effect: Destroy a character with an alteration.

worm.name: Worm
worm.effect: You can no longer draw cards.

orphans.name: Orphans
orphans.effect: At the end of your turn, give the {{strength}} alteration to a character in {{front}} position.

prince.name: Prince
prince.effect: Give the {{strength}} alteration to all other {{desert}} allies.
